<div class="title-box">
  <h1><strong>Gym Secrets: Trends You Never Knew About!</strong></h1>
</div>

<div class="textbox">
  <p>Hi, everyone! Welcome to our project, where we explore gym check-in patterns and user demographics to uncover key trends in fitness behavior. By offering insights into peak workout times, demographic trends, and popular locations, we aim to help fitness enthusiasts optimize their schedules and support newcomers in starting their fitness journeys with confidence, inspired by the habits of regular gym-goers. For gyms, this project provides valuable data to enhance services, streamline staffing, and create targeted marketing strategies to better meet client needs. Together, we strive to create a more informed, inclusive, and accessible fitness environment for all.</p>

  <p><strong>Main Research Questions:</strong></p>
  <ul>
    <li>What are the key factors influencing calorie expenditure during physical activities</li>
    <li>What factors determine the workout duration of gym-goers?</li>
    <li>What factors influence members' selection among the Basic, Pro, and Student subscription plans?</li>
  </ul>

</div>

```{css, echo=FALSE}
body {
  background-image: url('images/gym.jpeg');
  background-size: cover;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-attachment: fixed;
  font-family: 'Open Sans', Arial, sans-serif; 
  color: #333; 
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
}

.title-box {
  background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.79); 
  padding: 20px; 
  border-radius: 10px;
  text-align: center;
  margin: 30px auto;
  max-width: 800px; 
  box-shadow: 0px 4px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2); 
}

.textbox {
  background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.79); 
  padding: 15px;
  border-radius: 10px;
  margin: 20px auto;
  max-width: 800px; 
  box-shadow: 0px 4px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
  line-height: 1.6; 
  font-size: 16px;
}

.textbox iframe {
  display: block;
  margin: 20px auto;
  border-radius: 5px; 
  box-shadow: 0px 4px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2); 
}

nav a:hover {
  text-decoration: underline;
  color: #007BFF; /* Blue for hover effect */
  transition: color 0.3s ease;
}

button, .btn {
  background-color: #007BFF; /* Blue button */
  color: #fff;
  border: none;
  padding: 10px 20px;
  border-radius: 5px;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: background-color 0.3s ease;
}

button:hover, .btn:hover {
  background-color: #0056b3; /* Darker blue on hover */
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .title-box, .textbox {
    margin: 10px;
    padding: 15px;
    font-size: 90%; /* Adjust font size for smaller screens */
  }
}

```
